alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 10 at 10:37PM AKST until February 11 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Northeast Gulf Coast including Yakutat. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Heavy, wet snow will be difficult to manage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A transition to rain is expected mid-day Friday with up to an inch of rain expected in the 12 hours following the changeover.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
